meanings.definition: Relating to the separation of proteins using electrophoresis and immunological techniques.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted an immunoelectrophoretically analysis of the protein samples.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician performed an immunoelectrophoretically test to identify the different protein components.
meanings.sent3: The immunoelectrophoretically separated proteins danced under the microscope, each showing off their unique moves.
meanings.sent4: The immunoelectrophoretically distinct bands on the gel resembled a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The students observed the immunoelectrophoretically separated proteins with awe and curiosity.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the process of separating proteins using electrophoresis and immunological methods.
meanings.sent1: The proteins were immunoelectrophoretically separated for further analysis.
meanings.sent2: She observed the proteins moving immunoelectrophoretically through the gel.
meanings.sent3: The proteins raced immunoelectrophoretically towards the finish line of separation.
meanings.sent4: The data was immunoelectrophoretically analyzed to determine the protein composition.
meanings.sent5: The results were immunoelectrophoretically clear, showing distinct protein bands.
